Text:
zoveel downers en zo weinig bedankjes

BEDANKT

Agree with miepje2 but why is there no link AFTER the download process has finished that takes you back to the up loader to encourage placing a comment? Sometimes I can't even find back the original file because 5-6 days may have passed before my download has completed...
Often want to place a comment but give up as it's like looking for a needle in a hay stack.
